categories.weapon: Items used to deal damage in combat
categories.key_item: Important items for quests and progression
categories.treasure: Valuable items that can be sold

rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword
rusty_sword.description: A pitted blade, barely holding an edge. Better than nothing.

iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
iron_sword.description: A serviceable blade of forged iron.
iron_sword.flavor_text: The backbone of any adventurer's arsenal.

silver_blade.name: Silver Blade
silver_blade.description: A gleaming sword of pure silver. Deadly against the undead.
silver_blade.flavor_text: The bane of creatures that refuse to stay dead.

flame_tongue.name: Flame Tongue
flame_tongue.description: A blade wreathed in eternal flame. Burns hot to the touch.
flame_tongue.flavor_text: Forged in dragonfire, or so the merchants claim.

vorpal_blade.name: Vorpal Blade
vorpal_blade.description: A blade of impossible sharpness. Severs more than flesh.
vorpal_blade.flavor_text: One, two! One, two! And through and through!

wooden_staff.name: Wooden Staff
wooden_staff.description: A simple walking staff that doubles as a weapon.
wooden_staff.flavor_text: The journey of a thousand spells begins with a single stick.

staff_of_flames.name: Staff of Flames
staff_of_flames.description: A staff crowned with an ever-burning ember.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.flavor_text: It's not much, but it's honest protection.

chainmail.name: Chainmail
chainmail.description: Interlocking rings of steel provide solid protection.
chainmail.flavor_text: The clinking announces your presence, but keeps you alive.

plate_armor.name: Plate Armor
plate_armor.description: Full plate armor. Heavy but nearly impenetrable.
plate_armor.flavor_text: Walk like a fortress, fight like a mountain.

shadow_cloak.name: Shadow Cloak
shadow_cloak.description: A cloak woven from darkness itself.

wooden_shield.name: Wooden Shield
wooden_shield.description: A simple round shield of oak.
wooden_shield.flavor_text: Splinters are preferable to sword wounds.

tower_shield.name: Tower Shield
tower_shield.description: A massive shield that can cover your entire body.
tower_shield.flavor_text: Mobile cover for the cautious warrior.

healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
healing_potion.description: A ruby-red liquid that mends wounds.

greater_healing_potion.name: Greater Healing Potion
greater_healing_potion.description: A potent healing draught that rapidly restores vitality.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.flavor_text: Prevention is better, but this is cheaper.

mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
mana_potion.description: A shimmering blue elixir that restores magical energy.
mana_potion.flavor_text: Liquidized starlight, or so they say.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: Creates a cloud of obscuring smoke.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A wooden torch soaked in pitch.

lantern.name: Lantern
lantern.description: A hooded lantern providing steady light.
lantern.flavor_text: A civilized light for uncivilized places.

rope.name: Rope
rope.description: Fifty feet of sturdy hemp rope.
rope.flavor_text: An adventurer's best friend, besides their sword.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.description: A set of thieves' tools for opening locks.

grappling_hook.name: Grappling Hook
grappling_hook.description: A three-pronged hook for scaling walls.

ancient_key.name: Ancient Key
ancient_key.description: An ornate key of unknown origin. It hums with latent power.
ancient_key.flavor_text: What ancient lock awaits this ancient key?

dungeon_map_fragment.name: Map Fragment
dungeon_map_fragment.description: A torn piece of parchment showing partial dungeon layout.
dungeon_map_fragment.flavor_text: Three more pieces and you might have something.

soul_gem.name: Soul Gem
soul_gem.description: A crystallized fragment of life essence.

dragon_scale.name: Dragon Scale
dragon_scale.description: A single scale from a dragon's hide, still warm.
dragon_scale.flavor_text: The dragon probably wants this back.

scroll_fireball.name: Scroll of Fireball
scroll_fireball.description: A magical scroll containing a fireball spell.
scroll_fireball.flavor_text: Point away from face before reading.

scroll_teleport.name: Scroll of Teleport
scroll_teleport.description: A magical scroll that transports you to safety.

scroll_light.name: Scroll of Light
scroll_light.description: A magical scroll that creates lasting illumination.
scroll_light.flavor_text: Let there be light, in scroll form.

rare_gem.name: Rare Gem
rare_gem.description: A precious gemstone of exceptional quality.
rare_gem.flavor_text: Pretty. Valuable. Probably stolen from somewhere.

crown_of_the_depths.name: Crown of the Depths
crown_of_the_depths.description: An ancient crown pulsing with dark power.
crown_of_the_depths.flavor_text: Heavy is the head that wears the crown. Literally.

tattered_map.name: Tattered Map
tattered_map.description: A dying adventurer's map, marked with warnings.
tattered_map.flavor_text: X marks the spot. And the traps. And the monsters.

poison_vial.name: Poison Vial
poison_vial.description: A vial of potent poison for coating weapons.
